lines.text: Uhm, tell me. Are we meeting in a dream?
Then it's really true. I fell from the third floor.
I've never seen anybody make love in the air before!
But that's how you make little puma men.
Have you ever made love in the air?
How else would you make little puma men?
Each man is a God. Each man is free.
I always perfer to strike first.
There is often more truth in legend than in history.
Your mind and your will belong to me... forever!

The man who control the destiny of the world will be here! When the world is mine, I alone will decide whether it is to be war or peace, life or death, according to the New Order which I shall establish!
You cannot escape me! You can no longer jump into space! Because you are made of earth! And to earth, you shall return!
I do not need to kill to find you.
